title: FT: Clark Griffith Batting Polar Bear HOF
author: colco

posts.post_title: FT: Clark Griffith Batting Polar Bear HOF
posts.post_content:
Interested in:
Pre-WWII HOFers
T206
T205
1915 Cracker Jack
Caramel cards
1933 Goudey
1934 Goudey
Pre-WWII lots
Mid-grade or better Pre-WWII cards
Pre-1970 HOF rookie cards

If nothing you have meets the above baskets please still feel free to make an offer on this card and check out my other cards available for trade throughout the BST forum if you'd like to make an offer on those as well.

T206 Clark Griffith Batting Polar Bear Back HOF
Condition: Authentic. I believe this card is trimmed, but I could be wrong and I will leave you to judge by the photographs. Besides that issue, this card has a small tear on the bottom through the second "c" in "Cincinnati" that goes up to the end of the border and a couple of spots of paper loss on Griffith's jersey. Still holds great eye appeal and is one of the best looking Griffiths I have seen.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=326832&d=1535166755[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=326833&d=1535166781[/IMG]

If you would like better/ more detailed scans just ask. Thank you.
